greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest k such that (n+1)(n+2)...(n+k) is divisible by n!.
comment: a(n) <= n. a(n) < n rarely, e.g. for n = 6, 15 etc. a(p) = p, p is a prime.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Sep 07 2002
ext: Edited by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 02 2010
